conclusion: Ping-pong ball mass: M, Bullet mass: m, Table height: h, Horizontal distance traveled by ball after impact: s

premise: Conservation of momentum: m v_bullet = (m + M) v_combined

conclusion: After the collision, the combined system (bullet+ball) becomes a projectile with initial horizontal velocity: v_combined, initial vertical velocity: 0, falling from height: h

premise: Time of flight formula: t = sqrt(2h/g)

conclusion: v_combined = s / t = s / sqrt(2h/g) = s * sqrt(g/2h)

premise: Substitute v_combined into v_bullet = (m + M) v_combined / m
